name: Zombie Overkill 3D
description:
In 2150 the frontier has finally fallen and zombies transformed by T virus have invaded every corner of the world. As the lone survivor of a zombie apocalypse, it's up to you to battle legions of the undead in a never ending battle for survival!

Zombie Overkill is #1 realistic 3D action shooter game boasting spectacular graphics and blistering action sequences. Delve into 40+ challenging missions through cities and towns using a devastating arsenal of weapons including the iconic flamethrower against the walking dead. It’s time to bust your guts, kill zombies and wreak explosive havoc now!

Game Features:
- Stunning 3D graphics and immersive CD quality audio
- Highly addicting, highly polished top down shooter game-play
- Intuitive touch-screen controls are easy to pick up and play
